is a city in the province of
The city center and ramparts are easily navigated on foot. Twenty minutes takes you straight across town.

value: The old Beguinage, beautifully restored, now with some art shops open in Summer.
The main church, a beautiful example of "Demer Gothic", the "Demer" being the local small river.

Go swimming at "Halve Maan" provincial open air swimming pool. A wonderful place to while away a sunny afternoon in this lazy town. 

Walk the old city ramparts, a very green belt around the city. It easily connects into the surrounding countryside.

Take a parachuting class in the nearby (4 km) Schaffen airport, which doubles as training grounds for the Belgian paratroop regiment.
